properties.name: scannedFiles
properties.docs:
This is an array with either file paths or base64 images for the
document scan.

properties.name: status
properties.docs:
The status lets you know if the document scan completes successfully,
or if the user cancels before completing the document scan.

properties.name: maxNumDocuments
properties.docs: Android only: The maximum number of photos an user can take (not counting photo retakes)

properties.name: responseType
properties.docs:
The response comes back in this format on success. It can be the document
scan image file paths or base64 images.

members.name: Success
members.docs:
The status comes back as success if the document scan completes
successfully.

members.name: Cancel
members.docs:
The status comes back as cancel if the user closes out of the camera
before completing the document scan.

members.name: Base64
members.docs: Use this response type if you want document scan returned as base64 images.

members.name: ImageFilePath
members.docs: Use this response type if you want document scan returned as inmage file paths.
